ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Feeling kinda useless sometimes
ygData.msgSnippet: if you are grouped with an enchanter and/or shaman you are always going to feel like that.  i say take a break from your normal do-it-all responsibilities =)
ygData.messageBody:
if you are grouped with an enchanter and/or shaman you are always going to
feel like that. i say take a break from your normal do-it-all
responsibilities =) and when there is no enchanter around, you can come to
the rescue.

Shada

> My problem: I play mostly on the weekends, and since I'm in a pretty
> tight guild (and a lot of them are available on the weekend), I play
> mostly with my guild. This means that a typical party is: Me,
> Enchanter, Cleric, maybe a Shaman, tanks. The tanks always include at
> least one ranger/druid (snare) or paladin (root) for stopping MOBs.
>
